Pre-Game Insights: Argentina has won its last four matches in a row, most recently defeating Ecuador 1-0 thanks to an Angel Di Maria goal in the 40th minute to secure the victory.
Guatemala is likewise undefeated in its last four matches, defeating the British Virgin Islands 3-0, Dominica 6-0, and drawing 1-1 with Guatemala and 0-0 with Venezuela.
